## How does physical activity protect against cancer?
How does physical activity protect against cancer?
There are a number of biological mechanisms through which physical activity might protect against cancer. These include effects of physical activity on blood sugar levels and insulin and related hormones, sex hormones, inflammation, and immune function, all of which affect cancer risk. Physical activity also helps keep you from gaining weight and helps in maintaining a
